titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Penn CAJS: RAR MS 85.126.23: Translation and commentary on Numbers 5:13-17

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Biblical verses end with colon plus a space. Paragraphs in the commentary are divided by a space. Identical to the text found in the nearly complete version of Japheth on Numbers ms. Cambridge Trinity College F12.110 (Loewe catalogue no. 25), from the end of p. 18 verso to the middle of p. 19 verso. In the translation sentences, a Hebrew lead-word is provided.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library
